TopicTitle: Getting Ferrams Aerospace Research + Firespitter to play nice

Articles.Content:
I've tried getting the latest version of the two mods to work together but I have had no such luck with the wings. Is there anybody who has the .CFG of the firespitter parts properly working on the .20 versions of FAR and FS??
